info.name: Arachnie
info.description: The construction for my custom Arachnie subrace for tieflings.
info.author: Gustavo Schip

description.p: The followers of Lolth often find themselves blessed or cursed by her influence, and none more so than the Arachnie tieflings. Born with the essence of spiders, they embody the cunning and ferocity of their eight-legged kin. Emerging from the dark corners of the Underdark, these tieflings have honed their abilities to survive and thrive in the harshest environments, leveraging their unique traits to navigate both physical and social webs.

Ability Score Increase.
Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

Superior Darkvision.
Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

Spider Expertise.
You gain proficiency with the Net, and you know the Web spell. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

Spider Sense.
When you are in spider form and within a web you created using the Web spell, you have blindsight up to a range of 15 feet, but both you and the target must be within the same web.

Inherent Form.
When in spider form, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed, and you are immune to the negative effects of webs.

Inherent Resistance.
You have resistance to poison damage.
